conversations.body_text:
hi.i received the pedal haptic today.sadly they only have the clutch and throttle bracket in the box.the brake bracket is missing.i also ordered extra u shaped brackets for $12 and it seems they havent arrived either.
i therefore have no way of fitting the brake haptics.
please help.
regards toby

Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) secure email.

this is incorrect.i am waiting for full delivery
